mb.web
Class WebThreadServer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      mb.web.WebThread
          mb.web.WebThreadServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WebThreadServer
extends WebThread

Server for TicTacToe game. Establishes serversocket, launches frame, and listens for incoming connections. In case of a connection, new WebThreadServerClient object is created.

Author:
mb

log

public void log(java.lang.String s)
Description copied from class: WebThread
Adds an entry to log. What a log is will probably change over time. The direction of output of different kinds of threads may differ, but all of them must implement a log. Implementation may look like "System.out.println(s);" but it must be done.

Overrides:
log in class WebThread
Parameters:
s - an entry
